items.title: The ChatGPT Atlas browser still feels like Googling with extra steps
items.summary: This week, OpenAI debuted its long-rumored AI browser that aims to put its AI chatbot at the center of the internet. The browser, called ChatGPT Atlas, is entering a space that's already occupied by Perplexity's Comet and Google Gemini in Chrome. OpenAI is likely betting that putting ChatGPT front and center is enough to draw […]

items.title: Ember’s app-controlled 14-oz Smart Mug 2 in white is down to its lowest price of the year at $90
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that gets you Ember’s 14-oz Smart Mug 2 in white for $89.99 shipped. This is regularly a $150 unit, which is now seeing a $60 discount. Today’s deal delivers a straight-up 40% discount to mark the return of the lowest price we’ve tracked for this model outside of members-only Costco deals and in-store offers. You can get this in a few different colors, most of which are also discounted right now. Best Buy is matching today’s deal on this white Smart Mug 2 as part of its Clearance sale, so be sure to grab it after getting more details below.

Bose unleashed its new 2nd Gen Ultra QuietComfort headphones this year with some enhancements to the ANC tech and a few other minor tweaks, but the original set is still a great pair of headphones, especially if you can score a deep deal. Over at Best Buy, you will now find “excellent” condition open-box units sitting down at $243.99 shipped to deliver one of the lowest prices we have tracked on the regularly $429 headphones.

items.title: Razer’s MX Master ergonomic mouse alternative is 50% off today at just $50
items.summary:
As part of its winter sale on electronics, Woot is offering Razer’s Pro Click Humanscale Wireless ergonomic mouse for $49.99 shipped. Though there is a newer version of this mouse available now, this has still been holding its full $100 steady at Amazon, where it has never dropped below the $78 mark. Today’s deal at Woot, however, shaves a solid $50 off its usual going rate, landing it $28 below its previous all-time low. It’s a good option to consider if you want to pick up an ergonomic mouse for your workstation and don’t want to pay the full price for Logitech’s MX Master models. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Amazon’s popular Blink Mini 2 smart cam just dropped to $18 all-time low, 2-pack down at $28 (Up to 60% off)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops its ultra-affordable Blink Mini 2 smart camera down to $17.99 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. This is regularly a $40 unit, which is now seeing a straight-up $22 markdown. Today’s 55% discount lands it $2 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month when it hit $20 as part of Amazon’s early Prime Big Deal Day sale. The entire Blink Mini 2 lineup, which includes both 2- and 3-pack along with the outdoor adapter, has hit a new all-time low today, so be sure to grab them. While the newer Blink Mini 2K+ offers sharper 2K resolution, the current discount on the original Blink Mini 2 makes it an easy recommendation. Head below for more details.

items.title: Score the new Xbox gaming handhelds at their best prices ever, now from $535 (Open-box “Excellent” w/ 1-yr. warranty)
items.summary:
Update: Best Buy now has an open-box unit of the new Xbox Ally X gaming handheld in “Excellent” condition for $949.99 shipped. That’s $50 less than its full $1,000 price and the best we’ve tracked so far. The standard Xbox ROG Ally model also available at $534.99 shipped. More details in the original post below.

If you don’t want to pay the full $600 price for a new Xbox Ally gaming handheld, Best Buy has an open box “Excellent” unit for $534.99 shipped. That’s $65 off its usual going rate, and the best price we’ve tracked for it to date. It hasn’t even been a full week since this particular handheld started shipping, so this unit is likely barely used and is hence marked to be in “like new” condition. The brand-new model, meanwhile, still sells at full price. Details below.

items.summary:

items.title: iPhone Air Production Cut To Nearly “End Of Production” Levels

There hasn’t been rumours of a second iPhone Air yet, but Apple is reportedly slashing production of the current model. […]
